CustomField.description: Prorated price for the product quoted by this line item. This price will only differ from Special Price if the product is a subscription and the line item is being prorated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Prorated price for the product quoted by this line item. This price will only differ from Special Price if the product is a subscription and the line item is being prorated.
CustomField.label: Prorated Unit Price
